hadiths.text: Umm Salamah said; When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) gave the salutation, he stayed for a while. By this people thought that women should return earlier than men

chapter.ara-name: باب انْصِرَافِ النِّسَاءِ قَبْلَ الرِّجَالِ مِنَ الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Women Leavig Before Men After Prayer
